mdata.xhtml:
The Yaris T2 is a compact car with a lot to offer. Some of the features included are:

15" steel wheels
Black outside door handles
Black door mirrors with integrated turning signal
6 - speaker radio/CD system with USB and aux-in Urethane steering wheel with audio switches

mdata.xhtml:
The SR model features whole range of sophisticated details. These include (additional to TR)

16" sports alloy wheels
Front fog lamps with smoked chrome surround
Darkened headlamps
Roof spoiler
Sports suspension
Fabric and leather upholstery
Perforated steering wheel and leather parking brake with red stitching

derivatives.description: Icon Plus 5dr 1.0 VVT-i Man

options.options: No Options

derivatives.description: Icon Plus 5dr 1.0 VVT-i Man Style

options.options: Style Pack

mdata.expanded:
Adding the Style pack to your Yaris gives you the following features:

Front LED Daytime Running Lights
Ensures added safety allowing you to be seen quickly by others in all daylight conditions
Chrome Side sills
A tasteful chrome trim to complement and enhance the Yaris's sculpted sills
Exhaust pipe finisher
Made with a durable chrome finish to enhance the rear of your car with a sporty yet sophisticated appearance
Scuff plates
The stylish way to protect door sill paintwork against scratching. Available for the front and rear side doors, in a brushed aluminium finish

derivatives.description: Icon Plus 5dr 1.0 VVT-i Man Touch and Go Protection

options.options: Protection Pack, Touch and Go Navigation

mdata.expanded:

Front and Rear parking sensors
Front and Rear Mud flaps
Rear bumper protection plate
Boot liner
Carpet Mat
